column4: I turned off my wif using the menu at the top and uncheck the "enable wireless" or whatever it's called.
Now, whatever I do I can't turn it on. It's grayed out.
some drivers like to blow up when you do that restaring fixes it
I tried to turn it on from Windows but booting into Ubuntu turns wireless off again
Oh, I've restarted more than once :)
and it didnt come back as on
do sudo ip net up wlan0
Nope. The physical button does nothing. The menu is frayed out. Windows works though but turns off when I boot into ubuntu
thats the cli command to turn it on
sudo  ip link set wlan0 up
normaly wlan0 is the defult card name
I'll try that in one sec.
well thats the command to tell the softwhere to turn the card on
if the gui is not working for some reasion or it will fail and tell you why
rather then just a gray box
